channel.title: Hotkeys?
channel.description:
Ok guys, I was wondering if there was any way to add hotkeys to my server (Not sure if this is client-sided, or server). I'd like to add hotkeys( E.g when you press F1 it opens the Spell book tab, Press F2 it opens the quest tab, etc.) If anyone knows how to do this please give me a breif instructional. Any and all help is apreciated.
-Thanks
Zukyak
